Articles.Content:
my problem is that after i pasted the bd file in ksp/gamedata  it is not working means bd option and missile and bombs are not showing it is just same when i install new ksp on my pc

 

 

i beg you please resolve this problem

First of all, welcome to the forums. Secondly, read this: 

If you're asking for help, it's a good idea (I'd say required!) to include the version of KSP you're using, the version of the mod that's not working and any other mods you happen to be using as well.

Are you sure you copied the right folders into your GameData folder? If you downloaded the mod from spacedock or curseforge it probably came in a .zip file, unzipping that and dropping it straight into GameData will almost definitely NOT work. There's most likely a folder within it called GameData, you need to copy whatever is inside that folder into your KSP/GameData folder (or just copy the mod GameData and paste into the KSP root directory, it will end up inside KSP/GameData either way).

And give your forum posts a proper title, just putting your name doesn't tell anyone anything about what you're asking for.

Edited May 1, 2020 by jimmymcgoochie
